Package index

üöÄ Getting Started

Essential functions to begin your analysis

create_scht()
SCHT creation for large datasets with enhanced features
calculate_isoform_complexity_metrics()
Calculate all complexity metrics for all genes in SCHT object
plot_tc_landscape()
Transcriptomic complexity landscape plot with marginal distributions

üìä Data Import & Preprocessing

Functions for importing and preparing your data

create_transcript_info()
Create transcript information data frame from GTF file
generate_gene_counts
Generate gene counts from annotated isoform counts
plot_genes_per_cell_distribution()
Plot and analyse genes per cell distribution
recommend_qc_parameters()
Generate QC parameter recommendations

üß¨ Complexity Analysis

Core functions for transcriptomic complexity analysis

calculate_isoform_complexity_metrics()
Calculate all complexity metrics for all genes in SCHT object
select_genes_of_interest()
Select genes for further investigation based on complexity classification
find_complexity_pattern()
Find multi-dimensional complexity patterns
compare_gene_metrics()
Extract and compare metrics for multiple genes

üìà Visualisation - Complexity Landscapes

Functions for visualising overall complexity patterns

plot_tc_landscape()
Transcriptomic complexity landscape plot with marginal distributions
plot_tc_density()
Transcriptomic complexity density plot
plot_diversity_comparison()
Dual diversity comparison plot
plot_complexity_ridges()
Create ridge plots for visualising complexity metrics distributions
plot_threshold_visualisations()
Plot multiple threshold visualisations in a grid layout

üß© Visualisation - Isoform Patterns

Functions for visualising isoform-specific patterns

plot_isoform_coexpression()
Create a heatmap of isoform co-expression patterns using ComplexHeatmap
plot_isoform_profile()
Plot stacked isoform usage profiles
plot_isoform_transitions()
Plot isoform usage transitions across cell types

üéØ Visualisation - Multi-dimensional

Advanced visualisation for complex comparisons

plot_complexity_radar()
Create gene complexity radar chart
plot_single_gene_radar_cell_type()
Create radar chart for a single gene across cell types with enhanced visualization
plot_compare_multiple_genes_radar_cell_type()
Create radar charts by cell type with better label handling
plot_compare_tc_complexity_heatmap()
Create heatmaps for transcriptome complexity metrics across groups using ComplexHeatmap
plot_compare_tc_density_difference()
Compare transcriptomic complexity density differences between groups

üîó Co-expression Analysis

Comprehensive isoform co-expression analysis toolkit

calculate_isoform_coexpression()
Calculate isoform co-expression correlation matrix
calculate_gene_coexpression_all_celltypes()
Calculate gene co-expression across all cell types
detect_isoform_switching()
Detect isoform switching patterns
analyse_coexpression_conservation()
Analyse co-expression conservation across cell types
calculate_coexpression_stats()
Calculate co-expression statistics
calculate_celltype_coexpression_similarity()
Calculate cell type co-expression similarity
plot_coexpression_across_celltypes()
Plot co-expression patterns across cell types
plot_conservation_summary()
Create a summary visualisation of co-expression conservation
export_coexpression_results()
Export co-expression analysis results
launch_coexpression_app()
Interactive Co-expression Analysis Application

üîç Quality Control & Performance

Tools for QC and performance analysis

generate_qc_report()
Generate comprehensive QC report from SCHT object
calculate_scht_sparsity()
Calculate sparsity statistics for SCHT structure
calculate_ct_scht_sparsity()
Calculate sparsity statistics for cell type-specific SCHT
compare_sparsity()
Compare sparsity across different data representations
analyse_sparsity_for_table()
Comprehensive sparsity analysis for manuscript table
